|tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:A0:F8 |oui_eth=00:A0:F8 }} Part of the {{TagLine|Client Bridge 3000 Series}} "2976240701" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device is assumed to be using AR2313A. ==Serial== ===Pinout=== ===Info derived from=== {{SCollapse|boot log |
